headline: BAE Systems launches BAE Systems OneArc, a defense technology innovator to transform the modern battlespace
summary: BAE Systems, Inc. (LON: BA) announces the launch of BAE Systems OneArc (OneArc™), a defense technology innovator, delivering commercial products and solutions in synthetic training, simulation, interoperability, geospatial, data analytics, and artificial intelligence (AI). OneArc unites the strategic acquisitions of Bohemia Interactive Simulations, TerraSim, and Pitch Technologies to advance complementary mission-ready capabilities that better prepare and protect the warfighter for a rapidly cha

headline: BAE Systems (LSE:BA.) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: BAE Systems (LSE:BA.) shares have cooled off over the past month, slipping around 12% after a strong year of gains. That pullback has investors asking whether the defense giant is now trading at a more attractive entry point. See our latest analysis for BAE Systems. Despite the recent 11.8% 1 month share price pullback from around £18 to about £16.44, BAE’s longer term picture remains strong, with a 1 year total shareholder return of roughly 33% and a powerful 5 year total shareholder return...

headline: The FUTR Corp Appoints AI Pioneer, Damian Fozard to its Advisory Board to Advance Next-Generation Financial Agent Development

headline: British Airways blames Reeves’s air travel tax for raising price of loyalty flights
summary: British Airways (BA) has blamed Rachel Reeves’s tax increases for a sharp rise in fares available to members of its popular Avios loyalty scheme.

raw.headline: British Airways blames Reeves’s air travel tax for raising price of loyalty flights

headline: 2 Large-Cap Stocks Worth Your Attention and 1 We Brush Off
summary: Large-cap stocks usually command their industries because they have the scale to drive market trends. The flip side though is that their sheer size can limit growth as expanding further becomes an increasingly challenging task.

raw.headline: 2 Large-Cap Stocks Worth Your Attention and 1 We Brush Off
